Description of incident: On December 15 of 2005, an intruder installed key-logger was discovered on a computer that had been used to access Social Security numbers.  The keystroke capture program was installed by a relative of an employee in order to capture and read email messages that the staff member was sending.  The program was in operation from March 2004 to January 2005 and again from October 2005 to December 15.  The affected PC was removed from the office and had its hard drive scanned and cleaned.
